About Me


An Embedded Software Engineer graduated from Vaasa University of Applied Sciences, clear goal to expand knowledge in this high-tech era.

I am energetic and eager to learn new things whether that is about programming, natural sciences or historical mystery.

Projects

Self-Driving Car

Python skills, apply C++, apply matrices and calculus in code, and touch on computer vision and machine learning. These concepts will be applied to solving self-driving car problems.

Smart Music Player

Music player board based on GPS location with Raspberry Pi 3. This device has wifi connection, music control interface and GPIO interrupt button.

COVID-19 Tracker

A responsive web application which gets COVID-19 data from the server. This single web page is displayed with info boxes interacting with map and line graph using React JS.

About Me

I am energetic and eager to learn new knowledge whether that is about programming, natural sciences or historical mystery.
